content: next row just go into the st and make a single_crochet with only the white yarn 3 2sc increase 12 white 4 slip_stitch and f\o leave a yarn tail for sewing the last st in the magic_ring change your color to white before tightening up your magic_ring it should look like this after tightening the magic_ring row 2 half color change first st of row 3 single_crochet with white you can now cut off the black yarn and make a knot with the black and the white yarn tail to secure them and here it is the finished eye blush make 2 darker pink color 1 magic_ring with 6 st 6 2 increase x6 12 3 1sc increase 18 4 slip_stitch f\o leave a yarn tail for sewing nostrils make 2 darker pink color 1 magic_ring with 6 st 6 2 slip_stitch f\o leave a yarn tail for sewing tail lighter pink color 1 chain 21 2 start with the second loop from your hook and make 20hdc 3 f\o leave it to fold naturally or if it won t fold nicely by itself then help it a bit assembly a few tips on how to center everything on the head on the bottom of your muzzle the blo show you where the center is so you can easily center your nostrils by looking at that after that i pull a yarn through the center of the muzzle to the center of the head using it as a guide line to center the ears and the eyes the blush goes onto the center of the cheeks after everything is sewn on to the head i embroider the mouth before sewing it on to the body it s easier that way now that the head is done i sew on the legs to the body and then i sew on the arms when you sew the arms on sew them on the last row of the body evenly apart so 8 st should be between them on both sides just make sure to center them with the legs you already sewn on when that is done sew the head on make sure to pin it in place so it doesn t move while sewing i don t go around first i sew a st on each side and then a st on the front and on the back so it won t move when the head is almost fully sewn on stuff the body a bit more if needed so it won t get floppy and the tail is last make sure to center it nicely now you have your own little pig i hope you had fun making her as i did making mine and i hope you enjoyed this pattern see ya next time
